remarks: Any primitive ` N ` -th root of unity is a multiple of any other. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Nov-2015.)
statement:
idomsubgmo.g $e |- G = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) $.
proot1mul.o $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
proot1mul.k $e |- K = ( mrCls ` ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
proot1mul $p |- ( ( ( R e. IDomn /\ N e. NN ) /\ ( X e. ( `' O " { N } ) /\ Y e. ( `' O " { N } ) ) ) -> X e. ( K ` { Y } ) ) $.
